thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 06 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Euronext Announces Volumes For March 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Euronext Announces Volumes For March 2018
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - EURONEXT NV:
* EURONEXT ANNOUNCES VOLUMES FOR MARCH 2018 * ‍IN MARCH 2018, AVERAGE DAILY TRANSACTION VALUE ON EURONEXT CASH ORDER BOOK STOOD AT EUR 8,671 MILLION​
* ‍IN MARCH 2018, AVERAGE DAILY TRANSACTION VALUE WAS UP +17.3% COMPARED TO MARCH 2017​
* ‍FOR 1ST 3 MTHS OF 2018, AVERAGE DAILY TRANSACTION VALUE ON EURONEXT CASH ORDER BOOK EUR 8,507 MILLION
* ‍FOR 1ST 3 MTHS OF 2018, AVERAGE DAILY TRANSACTION VALUE ON EURONEXT CASH ORDER BOOK WAS UP +21.9% VERSUS YEAR AGO​
* ‍ON MARCH 16, 2018, DAILY VOLUME REACHED RECORD FOR YEAR AT EUR 19,684 MILLION, 2ND MOST ACTIVE DAY SINCE 2010​
* ‍AVERAGE DAILY TRANSACTION VALUE ON ETF ORDER BOOK WAS EUR 307 MILLION, UP +15.2% COMPARED TO MARCH 2017​
* ‍AT END-MARCH 2018, 796 ETFS WERE LISTED ON EURONEXT COMPARED TO 804 AT END OF DECEMBER 2017​
* ‍IN MARCH 2018, OVERALL AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME ON DERIVATIVES WAS OF 587,528 CONTRACTS, UP +9.1% VERSUS MARCH 2017​
* ‍IN MARCH 2018, EUR 836 MILLION WAS RAISED ON NEW LISTINGS​
* ‍AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME ON SPOT FOREIGN EXCHANGE MARKET OF FASTMATCH WAS $18,773 MILLION, DOWN -2.1% VERSUS MARCH 2017​
* ‍AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME ON EQUITY INDEX DERIVATIVES WAS OF 251,840 CONTRACTS, UP +10.7% COMPARED TO MARCH 2017​
* ‍AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME ON INDIVIDUAL EQUITY DERIVATIVES REACHED 288,562 CONTRACTS, UP +12.8% VERSUS MARCH 2017​
* ‍MARCH 2018 AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME ON COMMODITIES DERIVATIVES WAS 47,126 CONTRACTS, DOWN -14.7% VSMARCH 2017​
* ‍AT END OF MARCH 2018, 796 ETFS WERE LISTED ON EURONEXT COMPARED TO 804 AT END-DECEMBER 2017​
* ‍IN MARCH 2018, EUR 13.1 BILLION WAS RAISED ON EURONEXT IN CORPORATE BONDS​
* IN MARCH 2018, ‍EUR 5.1 BILLION WAS RAISED IN FOLLOW-ON EQUITY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
